ygData.subject: RE: Ogre bouncers (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: This doesn t surprise me. I know that the little hamburglars in Misty Thicket always have a small round shield, a spear (12plat I think), a silver ring, and a
ygData.messageBody:
This doesn't surprise me. I know that the little hamburglars in Misty
Thicket always have a small round shield, a spear (12plat I think), a silver
ring, and a squad ring (Not the same as the quest item though). A co-worker
who plays an ogre spent some time there and he got this off every one of em.
No vendors for him to sell to so he junked most of it, especially the rings
which were lore.
Oddly enough one of the rings had +5 CHA and said it was useable by ALL/ALL
but it can't be equipped on any part of your body...

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 7:56 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Ogre bouncers (OT)


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Here's the kicker though. Every bouncer we killed dropped a standard long
sword and round shield. These are regular store bought items. Because they
are regular store bought items, when you sell them to a merchant, you get
more PP for them than you do FS weapons. I got 9PP for every long sword and
I think 5PP for every shield.

Galtin of E'ci
30 bard
